frontmatter.title: 18F’s Agile Contract Paves the Way for Better Procurement
frontmatter.link_text: Behind the Scenes of 18F’s Agile Contract

node.html: CivicActions’ Henry Poole and Aaron Pava join others in the innovative vendor community to discuss the challenges and rewards of participating in 18F’s prototype-driven agile contract process.

frontmatter.title: CivicActions in FCW: ‘One Company Shows How It Is Embracing Agile’
frontmatter.link_text: One Company Shows How It Is Embracing Agile

node.html: Focusing on users and integrating agile as “a way of life” helped CivicActions teams successfully build a working product for the FDA in less than a week during a contest held by the General Services Administration and 18F for a spot in the new agile vendor pool.

node.html: CivicActions supports Agile Government Leadership in an effort to create resources and community to help agencies learn and adopt agile methodologies.

node.html: CivicActions’ Elizabeth Raley explains how the newly launched Agile Government Handbook will help fill a critical need for government agencies looking for a starting point for learning about agile.

node.html: CivicActions’ Elizabeth Raley and Salt Lake City CIO Bill Haight, both members of the Agile Government Leadership steering committee, explain how organizations can help agencies change their approach to IT projects through cultural transformation and agile methodologies.
